fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.edp_cs.connections

Class URIServiceEndPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractEndPoint
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.endpoints.EndPoint<CI>
        • fr.sorbonne_u.components.endpoints.BCMEndPoint<URIConsumerCI>
          • fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.edp_cs.connections.URIServiceEndPoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractEndPointI, BCMEndPointI<URIConsumerCI>, EndPointI<URIConsumerCI>, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class URIServiceEndPoint
extends BCMEndPoint<URIConsumerCI>
    The class URIServiceEndPoint implements the BCM endpoint for the URI service in the basic client/server example.
